itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss why the Kentucky Derby made the right call, Game 7 NHL match-ups between the Sharks/Avs and Stars/Blues, why the Golden State Warriors might not win the NBA Championship, and if the XFL will work.
